cu.explanation_en: Setting local_s_portc to 0 (invalid port number) will cause F1 interface configuration failure and prevent CU-DU communication.

du.explanation_en: Setting dl_UL_TransmissionPeriodicity to 15 (valid range 0-7) will cause TDD periodicity configuration validation failure and prevent frame structure setup.
du.explanation_zh: 將 dl_UL_TransmissionPeriodicity 設定為 15（有效範圍 0-7）會導致 TDD 週期配置驗證失敗，並阻止幀結構設置。
